FEED.toast_network: You are not connected to internet. To use the app, connect to a WiFi or mobile network.
FEED.toast_api: Our servers seems to be down. Please wait a moment, our team is working on fixing the problem(s).

PROFILE.error_image: The image size is too big.

SECURITY.toast_mail: Your email has been sucessfully changed.
SECURITY.toast_pwd: Your password has been sucessfully changed.

NOTIFICATIONS.push_1: Be notified when a senior responds to your message.
NOTIFICATIONS.push_2: Be notified when a senior sends you a voice message.
NOTIFICATIONS.push_3: Be notified when a senior reads/listens to your message.
NOTIFICATIONS.email_1: Receive an email when major changes are made to the application.

HELP.paragraph: A question or a bug ? Join our forum and exchange with the team and the community.

EDIT_MAIL.paragraph1: Enter a your new email below to change your email and recieve a validation code.
EDIT_MAIL.paragraph2: To verify your new email, please enter below the 5 digits code we just sent you.
EDIT_MAIL.mail_invalid: Email already used for another account.
EDIT_MAIL.code_invalid: The code is not valid anymore.

EDIT_PWD.paragraph1: To set a new password, enter below your current and new password.
EDIT_PWD.paragraph2: To validate your new password, please enter below the 5 digits code we just sent you by email.
EDIT_PWD.code_invalid: The code is not valid anymore.

FORGOT_PWD.paragraph1: To reset your password, please enter below the 5 digits code we just sent you by email.
FORGOT_PWD.code_invalid: The code is not valid anymore.

LOGOUT.title: Are you sure you want to log out ?
LOGOUT.paragraph: You will be redirected to the home page and will need to log in again to access the app.

DELETE_ACCOUNT.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?
DELETE_ACCOUNT.paragraph_1_1: All of your data will be deleted immediatly and you will be redirected to the home page.
DELETE_ACCOUNT.paragraph_2: Your active subscription will be canceled of your data will be deleted immediatly and you will be redirected to the home page.
